title: Fire Summon
data:
{{version030}}
{{flavour|Summons demons of flame and damnation.}}

'''Fire Summon''' is a monster-only spell that summons 1-4 of the following fire-related demons:<ref>{{source ref|0.30.0|mon-cast.cc|6231}}</ref>

*{{monsterlink|Balrug}} (50%)
*{{monsterlink|Hellion}} (33.3%)
*{{monsterlink|Brimstone fiend}} (16.7%)

{{monsters with spell}}

Monsters can sustain at most four creatures summoned by this spell.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.30]], players could cast this spell by [[evoke|evoking]] the [[Sceptre of Asmodeus]].
*Prior to [[0.27]], this spell could summon [[efreet]]s and [[sun demon]]s. Also, Cerebov cast [[Summon Greater Demon]] instead of this spell.
